About.paragraph: We are an Enthusiasts, Tech Savvy, and Committed group of people with a vision to Innovate in providing world-class Tech Solutions.

Services.name: Mobile & Web Apps
Services.text: We build fast, reliable, secure, and scalable mobile/web apps to cater to Desktop, iOS & Android users.

Services.name: Cloud Applications
Services.text: Nothing is more cost-effective than hosting services on the AWS cloud. We help our clients to build & host a variety of services on AWS and assist them in optimizing cost for effective operations.

Services.name: Machine Learning & AI
Services.text: We create accurate machine models helping data scientists to make the right decisions for their businesses.

Features.title: BlockChain
Features.text: Blockchain skills became one of the most sought-after proficiencies in the world with the demand increasing by almost 2,000 percent from 2017 to 2020.

Features.title: Boom in Indian Start ups
Features.text: India new unicorns hub: 31 unicorns in 2021 and counting.

Features.title: Crypto Future
Features.text: Even as the Government has delayed cryptocurrency regulation in the country and the RBI is gearing up to introduce Indiaâ€™s own digital currency to counter private virtual currencies.

Features.title: World of applications
Features.text: SAAK labs entering into the world of web/mobile app development. A healthy work pipeline to boost the company.
